com.koalog.util.swing.control
Interface ObjectEditor

All Known Implementing Classes:
DOMElementEditor
public interface ObjectEditor

The interface to all object editor panels meant to be used in the TreeEditor control. Also, don't forget that an object editor panel must be a Component derivative.

For better performances, ObjectEditor instances should be shared as much as possible. That is, there should not be a one to one relationship between the object instances to edit and the editor instances.

Method Summary
 void setObject(java.lang.Object object)
          Set the current object.
 

Method Detail

setObject

public void setObject(java.lang.Object object)
Set the current object. The current object is the object edited by this control instance. When this method is invoked, all the fields of the control are updated with the passed object attributes.

Parameters:
object - The object to edit.
